00046 using namespace std;
00052 class ChpCheck : public RegressionCheck {
00053 
00054 public:
00055 
00063   ChpCheck(std::vector<std::string> &generated, std::vector<std::string> &gold, 
00064            int diffAllowed=0, const std::string &prefix="apt-", double eps=0.0001) {
00065     m_Generated = generated;
00066     m_Gold = gold;
00067     m_Eps_confidence = eps;
00068     m_Eps_pvalue = eps;
00069     m_Eps_signal = eps;
00070     m_DiffAllowed = diffAllowed;
00071     m_Prefix = prefix;
00072 
00073     fillInToIgnore(m_IgnoreMap, prefix); // things know to change like user, time, etc.
00074 
00075     setMaxError(30);
00076   }
00077 
00083   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00084     bool success = true;
00085     if(m_Generated.size() != m_Gold.size()) {
00086       return checkMsg(false, "CelCheck::check() - generated and gold vectors must be same size.",msg);
00087     }
00088     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Generated.size(); i++) {
00089         try {
00090             m_Generated[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Generated[i].c_str());
00091             m_Gold[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Gold[i].c_str());
00092             if(!headersSame(m_Generated[i], m_Gold[i], msg))
00093                 success = false;
00094             if(!dataSame(m_Generated[i], m_Gold[i], msg)) {
00095                 success = false;
00096             }
00097         } // end try
00098         catch(Except &e) {
00099             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00100         }
00101         catch(const std::exception &e) {
00102             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: standard exception: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00103         }
00104         catch(...) {
00105             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Uncaught Exception.",msg);
00106         }
00107     }
00108     return success;
00109   }
00110 
00114   void clearHeaderIgnore() {
00115       m_IgnoreMap.clear();
00116   }
00117 
00122   void addHeaderIgnore(std::string &key) {
00123       m_IgnoreMap.insert(key);
00124   }

00126 private:
00127   
00128   // Header entries to ignore
00129   static void fillInToIgnore(std::set<std::string> &ignoreMap, const std::string &prefix) {
00130     ignoreMap.clear();
00131     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "exec-guid");
00132     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "analysis-guid");
00133     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "time-str"); 
00134     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "free-mem");    
00135     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "cvs-id");
00136     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "version");
00137     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "opt-block-size");
00138     ignoreMap.insert(prefix + "opt-out-dir");
00139   }
00140 
00153   bool tagValuePairMostlySame(TagValuePairTypeList &gold, TagValuePairTypeList &test, std::string &msg) {
00154     bool same = true;
00155     map<string,string> testMap;
00156     map<string,string>::iterator testMapIter;
00157     TagValuePairTypeList::iterator testIter;
00158     // Load up test as a map which will be queried by items in gold.
00159     for(testIter = test.begin(); testIter != test.end(); ++testIter) {
00160       testMap[testIter->Tag] = testIter->Value;
00161     }
00162     TagValuePairTypeList::iterator goldIter;
00163     for(goldIter = gold.begin(); goldIter != gold.end(); ++goldIter) {
00164       // ignore items that are in the ignoreMap
00165       if(m_IgnoreMap.find(goldIter->Tag) == m_IgnoreMap.end()) {
00166         testMapIter = testMap.find(goldIter->Tag);
00167         if(testMapIter == testMap.end()) {
00168           msg += " Error: Test missing field: '" + ToStr(goldIter->Tag) + "'";
00169           same = false;
00170         }
00171         else {
00172           if(testMapIter->second != goldIter->Value &&
00173              Util::fileRoot(testMapIter->second) != Util::fileRoot(goldIter->Value)) {
00174             msg += " Error: for field '" + goldIter->Tag + "' expecting: '" + goldIter->Value + 
00175               "' got: '" + testMapIter->second + "'";
00176             same = false;
00177           }
00178         }
00179       }
00180     }
00181     return same;
00182   }
00183   
00184   bool headersSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00185     bool success = true;
00186     affxchp::CCHPFileData generatedChp, goldChp;
00187     affxchp::CCHPFileHeader genHdr, goldHdr;
00188     generatedChp.SetFileName(generated.c_str());
00189     goldChp.SetFileName(gold.c_str());
00190     if(!generatedChp.ReadHeader()) {
00191       success = false;
00192       msgs += "Can't read CHP" + ToStr(generated) + " error is: " + generatedChp.GetError();
00193     }
00194     if(!goldChp.ReadHeader()) {
00195       success = false;
00196       msgs += "Can't read CHP" + ToStr(gold) + " error is: " + goldChp.GetError();
00197     }
00198     if(success) {
00199       genHdr = generatedChp.GetHeader();
00200       goldHdr = goldChp.GetHeader();
00201       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetCols() == goldHdr.GetCols(), "Error: cols not the same. ", msgs);
00202       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetRows() == goldHdr.GetRows(), "Error: rows not the same. ", msgs);
00203       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets() == goldHdr.GetNumProbeSets(), "Error: NumProbeSets not the same. ", msgs);
00204       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetChipType() == goldHdr.GetChipType(), "Error: ChipType not the same. ", msgs);
00205       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetAlgVersion() == goldHdr.GetAlgVersion(), "Error: AlgVersion not the same. ", msgs);
00206       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetProgID() == goldHdr.GetProgID(), "Error: ProgID not the same. ", msgs);
00207       success &= checkMsg(genHdr.GetAssayType() == goldHdr.GetAssayType(), "Error: Assay Type not the same. ", msgs);
00208 
00209       TagValuePairTypeList &goldList = goldHdr.AlgorithmParameters();
00210       TagValuePairTypeList &genList = genHdr.AlgorithmParameters();
00211       bool paramSame = tagValuePairMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs);
00212       success &= paramSame;
00213 
00214       goldList = goldHdr.SummaryParameters();
00215       genList = genHdr.SummaryParameters();
00216       paramSame = tagValuePairMostlySame(goldList, genList, msgs);
00217       success &= paramSame;
00218     }
00219     return success;
00220   }
00221 
00222   bool dataSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00223     bool success = true;
00224     double maxDiffConf = -1;
00225     double maxDiffPval = -1;
00226     double maxDiffSignal = -1;
00227     int numDiff = 0;
00228 
00229     affxchp::CCHPFileData generatedChp, goldChp;
00230     affxchp::CCHPFileHeader genHdr, goldHdr;
00231     generatedChp.SetFileName(generated.c_str());
00232     goldChp.SetFileName(gold.c_str());
00233     if(!generatedChp.Read()) {
00234       success = false;
00235       msgs += "Can't read CHP" + ToStr(generated) + " error is: " + generatedChp.GetError();
00236     }
00237     if(!goldChp.Read()) {
00238       success = false;
00239       msgs += "Can't read CHP" + ToStr(gold) + " error is: " + goldChp.GetError();
00240     }    
00241 
00242     genHdr = generatedChp.GetHeader();    
00243         if(genHdr.GetAssayType() == affxchp::CCHPFileHeader::Genotyping) {
00244         for(int i = 0; i < genHdr.GetNumProbeSets(); i++) {
00245             bool localSuccess = true;
00246             affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *genResults = generatedChp.GetGenotypingResults(i);
00247             if(genResults == NULL)
00248                 Err::errAbort("Failed to get entry for test (" + ToStr(i) + "). File: " + generated + " Error: " + generatedChp.GetError());
00249             affxchp::CGenotypeProbeSetResults *goldResults = goldChp.GetGenotypingResults(i);
00250             if(goldResults == NULL)
00251                 Err::errAbort("Failed to get entry for gold (" + ToStr(i) + "). File: " + gold + " Error: " + generatedChp.GetError());
00252             if(goldResults->AlleleCall != genResults->AlleleCall) 
00253                 localSuccess = false;
00254             checkFloat(goldResults->Confidence, genResults->Confidence, m_Eps_confidence, localSuccess, maxDiffConf);
00255             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_AA, genResults->pvalue_AA, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00256             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_AB, genResults->pvalue_AB, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00257             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_BB, genResults->pvalue_BB, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00258             checkFloat(goldResults->pvalue_NoCall, genResults->pvalue_NoCall, m_Eps_pvalue, localSuccess, maxDiffPval);
00260             //checkFloat(goldResults->RAS1, genResults->RAS1, m_Eps_ras, localSuccess, maxDiffRas);
00261             //checkFloat(goldResults->RAS2, genResults->RAS2, m_Eps_ras, localSuccess, maxDiffRas);
00262             if(!localSuccess)
00263                 numDiff++;
00264             success &= localSuccess;
00265         }
00266         if(maxDiffConf > m_Eps_confidence)
00267             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffConf) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_confidence) + ") [confidence]");
00268         if(maxDiffPval > m_Eps_pvalue)
00269             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffPval) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_pvalue) + ") [pvalue]");
00270         if(numDiff > 0)
00271             Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " (" + 
00272                             ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + "%) were different.");
00273 
00274         std::string res = "different";
00275         if(success) 
00276             res = "same";
00277         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": checked " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " genotype entries.");
00278         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max confidence diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffConf));
00279         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max pvalue diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffPval));
00280         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00281     } else if(genHdr.GetAssayType() == affxchp::CCHPFileHeader::Expression) {
00282         for(int i = 0; i < genHdr.GetNumProbeSets(); i++) {
00283             bool localSuccess = true;
00284             affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *genResults = generatedChp.GetExpressionResults(i);
00285             affxchp::CExpressionProbeSetResults *goldResults = goldChp.GetExpressionResults(i);
00286             checkFloat(goldResults->Signal, genResults->Signal, m_Eps_signal, localSuccess, maxDiffSignal);
00288             if(!localSuccess)
00289                 numDiff++;
00290             success &= localSuccess;
00291         }
00292         if(maxDiffSignal > m_Eps_signal)
00293             Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiffSignal) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps_signal) + ") [signal]");
00294         if(numDiff > 0)
00295             Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " (" + 
00296                             ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + "%) were different.");
00297 
00298         std::string res = "different";
00299         if(success) 
00300             res = "same";
00301         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": checked " + ToStr(genHdr.GetNumProbeSets()) + " expression entries.");
00302         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": max signal diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiffSignal));
00303         Verbose::out(1, generated + ": chip is " + res + ".");
00304     } else {
00305         Err::errAbort("ChpCheck::ChpCheck() - unknown CHP type.");
00306     }
00307 
00308     if(!success && m_DiffAllowed >= numDiff) 
00309         success = true;
00310     if(!success)
00311       msgs += "Error: " + generated + " is different from " + gold + ". ";
00312     return success;
00313   }
00314       
00316   std::vector<std::string> m_Gold;
00318   std::vector<std::string> m_Generated;
00320   double m_Eps;
00321   double m_Eps_confidence;
00322   double m_Eps_pvalue;
00323   double m_Eps_signal;
00325   int m_DiffAllowed;
00327   std::string m_Prefix;
00329   std::set<std::string> m_IgnoreMap;
00330   
00331 };
